title: Block reportedly working on new iPad stand with built-in NFC reader for payments
content:
The well-known payments company Block (formerly known as Square) has always offered solutions for merchants who use iPads as sales terminals. However, this time, Block is now reportedly working on a new iPad stand that comes with a built-in NFC reader for payments.
